group_1.textLeft: What the heck made you act@like that toward my fake, Kaede?

group_1.textRight: I'm sorry, Rena!@Something came over me...

group_1.textLeft: And that something made you poke...@Poke, poke, POKE... Like this?
Rena! Kaede!@Knock it off!
You've been talkin' about@this the entire walk home...!
Be that as it may...@Yachiyo Nanami!
You still don't remember @my name, do you?! Grrrgh!
Well, it seems everyone's@back to their usual selves.

group_1.narration: Somehow we managed to find@each other in that Labyrinth.
And once we'd done that, we were@able to defeat Rena's fake, along@with everyone else's, and escape.

group_1.textLeft: But, in the end...
It was me who brought you all together!
Wasn't it?
By sending Yachiyo off somewhere@using the mirror, she found that girl!

group_1.textRight: And I learned something@interesting as a result.

group_1.textLeft: Hngh[chara:101000:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!
...Never mind that!@It's not even the least bit interestin'!
Hey!
That is intriguing… Yachiyo disappeared @when she was reflected in the mirror?
Well, I guess it's best not@to think about it too much...

group_1.textRight: Why is that?@Isn't it possible that...

group_1.textLeft: It was the right move at the time...
But it might be the wrong move next time.

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you never know what the@Endless Mirrors will do next.
It's tough to narrow down what@causes anything to happen in there.

group_1.textLeft: There are a lot of different reasons why@Magical Girls have disappeared there.

group_1.textRight: We only know one thing for sure...
The Mirror Layers just keep@expanding outward, endlessly...

group_1.textLeft: My jaw practically dropped@the first time I heard that...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, and it got us good@this time... Didn't it, Kaede?

group_1.textLeft: I've got just one piece of advice, Ria...
...Beware of mirrors.
...When you're in the Mirror@Witch's Labyrinth, that is!

group_1.textRight: Oh come on...@That was so lame...

group_1.textLeft: Well, you got lucky this time!@You can't depend on that happening next time!

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's exactly what I said before...@Don't touch things haphazardly.
Okay, okay, I get it...! Sheesh!
[chara:300100:lipSynch_0](I'll bring my own mirror next time...!)

group_1.textLeft: Now then...@Shall we head home?
I'll head back, too.

group_1.textRight: Before you do!@I just want to say one more time...
Oh, yes, me too...!@Thank you so much!

group_1.textLeft: Don't mention it...@...See you all later.

group_1.textRight: Hey! Have you remembered my name,@Yachiyo Nanami?! Wait, don't go yet!

group_1.textLeft: What's her deal?
Maybe it's better I don't know...@Come on, Rena, let's get outta here!

group_1.textRight: You'd better stay close to me @this time, Little Lost Kaede!
Oh, um... Bye, everyone!@Thanks again, Iroha!

group_1.textLeft: Okay...
Are you going to head out, too?

group_1.textRight: I probably should...@It's been a long day. I'm exhausted...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...@You've earned a break!
Sounds like someone's motivated.

group_1.textRight: I just can't let it go.@This Labyrinth is—

group_1.textLeft: Special, I know.@Has it piqued your interest?
...Hm?@What's wrong...?

group_1.textRight: I don't know if it's interesting...

group_1.textLeft: What do you mean...?

group_1.textRight: I don't know what it was...@But the whole time we were in there...
Something deep inside me @just kept eating away at me...

group_1.textLeft: Hey, I'm all about repeat visits!
We should just keep going@and see how far we can get!
Maybe we'll even find whatever@it is that's bugging you!
Let me give you one more@piece of advice, Iroha...
You'll lose sight of yourself if you@spend too long looking in the mirror...
Like they say, "Curiosity killed the cat"
Take it easy... Don't rush to @figure out what's bothering you.
Iroha!@Just focus on defeating Witches...
So, this Labyrinth is behind us!@...It's over and done with.
I'm thinking it's time I started @a new business, so to speak!
Running a shop here takes@a lot of work, you know!
Yes, it does!@So I'm going to go ahead and close for today.
I'll see you around!

group_1.narration: I received an invitation to this @place... Endless Mirrors.
It's a strange place...@A Labyrinth unlike any I've seen...
In fact...the word "Labyrinth"@has never felt more appropriate.
And this one in particular feels...personal.@It keeps calling me...deeper and deeper...
I've never truly stood in@front of a mirror until now...
